description: You are skilled at countering the spells of others using similar spells.

sections.text: When counterspelling, you may use a spell of the same school that is one or more spell levels higher than the target spell.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: Without this feat, you may counter a spell only with the same spell or with a spell specifically designated as countering the target spell.
sections.name: Normal

name: Improved Counterspell
